name: Work Life
description:
My first ever game, made in 3 months, inspired by my working life. You play as an Excel cell that's become sentient and is trying to escape Microsoft Office. Just like my working life.

This was a trial to develop my game development basics, and over the next 6 months I will develop a revised version which will include more levels, mechanics, polished aesthetics, music and - are you excited? - more Microsoft Office programs.

I didn't have to ask, really.
